parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the data center.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The task name. The name can contain letters, digits, hyphens (-), and underscores (\_). The name must be 255 characters in length.

parameters.name: StreamInput
parameters.description: The URL of the input stream.

parameters.name: StreamOutput
parameters.description: The URL of the output stream.
